name: places/ChIJTTr0zZhbwokRtAcVkdtJIB4
formattedAddress: 317 W 54th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 317 W 54th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Anu is a powerful trainer, creative consultant and public speaker.  He has dedicated his professional life to work that fosters a 'beloved community' as articulated by Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.  I have taken several of his training programs - in-person with a foundation that I serve with, and on-line over the course of many weeks - and highly recommend his experiential approach to shame-free, evidence-based learning in community.  This is the best investment you can make in yourself, any organization or company that you are a part of as well as all of our communities across the US.  Be your best self.  Be more with Anu.

originalText.text:
It was an absolute pleasure to collaborate with Anu and his team one two keynote speaking engagements for Feeding America's virtual conference! The sessions were called "Advancing Equity with Compassion" and "Compassion Lab." He listened to our session needs and asked great questions during our prep sessions, and it was a relief to be able to fully trust that he would create and deliver two very impactful sessions to more than 850 attendees. The positive feedback we've received in session surveys say it all about Anu's passion for equity, and his vulnerable and authentic style. If you're on an equity, diversity, and inclusion journey, I recommend you reach out to the kind folks at Be More with Anu!

Comments included "BEST session I've ever attended"
"This was super! The presentation felt relevant and both calming and motivating at the same time"
"I thoroughly enjoyed this session. It was an emotionally deep thinking opportunity to self-reflect and embrace our compassionate side."

originalText.text: Working with the Be More with Anu team is truly a thought provoking and insightful experience. My team now has better perspective when it comes to unconscious bias but they are also more aware of how it makes others in the workplace feel. A must need in corporate environments!

originalText.text: Highly recommend this B Corp for an informative introduction to diversity for your law firm. Anu engaged the audience and educated us throughout the presentation. Very easy to work with also.
